text.jpText: 視界全部奪うような 打ちつけるスコールの中でも
text.enText: Standing here blinded by this maelstrom\nCutting at me so hard I want to shout out

text.jpText: きっとさらわれ流れるのは 言い訳と迷いだけよ
text.enText: But still the only things the rain can wash away\nAll my excuses and self-doubt

text.jpText: ぬかるんだ現状に足をとられて
text.enText: As I stumble and get stuck in so much muddied ground

text.jpText: 陰鬱な空気が喉ふさいでも
text.enText: And the heavy air threatens to suffocate all sound

text.jpText: この声は絶やせないでしょう この足は止まらないでしょう
text.enText: Even so this voice of mine will never quiver\nAnd these legs of mine will never stand still
For as long as I can fight!

text.jpText: どうか全力で射抜いてよ 瞳で私を
text.enText: Keep your eyes on me and only me, attention undivided

text.jpText: 焼き付けていこう それは約束の進化系
text.enText: I'll sear it into memory, a promise newly evolved

text.jpText: 傷を痛がって投げ出す程度の思いじゃない
text.enText: No matter the pain, I will remain\nI want this so bad, it's in my veins
Today I'm making you my witness
